rawMetadata: {"compiler":{"version":"0.8.33+commit.64118f21"},"language":"Solidity","output":{"abi":[{"inputs":[{"internalType":"uint256[2]","name":"_pA","type":"uint256[2]"},{"internalType":"uint256[2][2]","name":"_pB","type":"uint256[2][2]"},{"internalType":"uint256[2]","name":"_pC","type":"uint256[2]"},{"internalType":"uint256[4]","name":"_pubSignals","type":"uint256[4]"}],"name":"verifyProof","outputs":[{"internalType":"bool","name":"","type":"bool"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"}],"devdoc":{"details":"Zero-knowledge commit-reveal voting with hidden ballot choices Security Properties: - Privacy: Choice hidden until reveal phase; observers cannot determine individual votes - Anti-Coercion: Voters cannot prove their selection to potential bribers - Double-Spend Prevention: Nullifier derived from hash(sk, proposalId) prevents reuse Based on: https://github.com/tokamak-network/zk-dex/blob/circom/docs/future/circuit-addons/d-governance/d1-private-voting.md","kind":"dev","methods":{},"title":"PrivateVoting (D1 Spec)","version":1},"userdoc":{"kind":"user","methods":{},"version":1}},"settings":{"compilationTarget":{"contracts/PrivateVoting.sol":"IVerifier"},"evmVersion":"prague","libraries":{},"metadata":{"bytecodeHash":"ipfs"},"optimizer":{"enabled":false,"runs":200},"remappings":[":forge-std/=lib/forge-std/src/",":poseidon-solidity/=node_modules/poseidon-solidity/"],"viaIR":true},"sources":{"contracts/PoseidonT5.sol":{"keccak256":"0x25e62a5772ffce0d64800f000acd2be7f3cff261776de75457980255702d675c","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://34611115e91101cac0c31ebfb463d6235eafb952f2d928172ecf211342ce0f82","dweb:/ipfs/QmX4xs6bWETdXgvivVwzB4jdZuykRTwyD6uUirJybmmXzj"]},"contracts/PrivateVoting.sol":{"keccak256":"0xc093c55bf81be36a3c1a10d6031d63c562d59291c245d395635230c11b70b575","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://74462727060110d09bfa09c9c5c47eb96b0d2d4d634ebdd7da5b048eccef50ce","dweb:/ipfs/QmQA7cDVHfXnAmSjZPoPMjJoxF7UKdNUuN8c1GXp7qgite"]}},"version":1}
